"Please allow this app to perform the following actions:
1. Access your account information 2. Access your friends list 3. Send messages
Attention:
1. Account information includes user name, profile photo and other Cubie account-specific information. 2. You will be notified and asked for permission before messages are sent. 3. Your information will be sent to the developer until you unregister from this service."
Start Cubie when my computer starts
Automatically Add Address Book Friends already using Cubie

"Before using your phone number to find friends, we must verify the number isn't being misused by others."
We will never use your phone number for other purposes.
"You'll receive a Pincode in under a minute. Type this Pincode into the box below. If you don't receive one, please go to previous page and input your number again."

"Your Cubie ID is made up of one or two letters and a series of numbers. Letters 'L' and 'i' are often confused, please make sure you're entering the right letter."
Keep Cubie Tab on my home screen when leaving Cubie
The Cubie Tab lets you reply to messages directly from your home screen
"Share life's moments on the go with Cubie!"
Find the pincode on your phone in Settings -> Cubie Lite (Desktop)
Please check this message on your mobile device
Cube Lite now supports sending Custom Stickers! You can also save the stickers shared by others and add them to your own collection! Try it!
Custom sticker is currently not supported
Now you can make custom stickers! Click on Custom Stickers and get creative!
Are you sure you really want to delete your account?
Warning: Deleted accounts cannot be reactivated, are you sure you want to continue?

"This process cannot be UNDONE!
Once your account is deleted, you cannot recover your data on Cubie. All information related to this account, including messages, friends and backup data, will be deleted permanently and all previous sticker purchases will be forfeited.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?"
Warning: Deleted accounts cannot be reactivated
Account deleted, please reinstall Cubie Messenger
Are you sure you want to delete this?
Press and hold to delete sticker
Once you delete a post it cannot be restored. Are you sure you want to remove it?

"Make a voice call to the Cubie server to verify your phone number. Please hang up directly after hearing the engaged tone.
In general, you won't be charged for this call. Some carriers may charge depending on your mobile plan."
Cubie will not disclose your phone number to others.
"Please select your region and input your phone number. We'll send a Pincode via SMS to your mobile phone."
We will send you a pincode via SMS to verify your phone no., then your friends can find you on Cubie. We will not disclose it or use it for other purposes.

"You'll receive a Pincode in under a minute. Type this Pincode into the box below. If you don't receive one, please go to previous page and input your number again. Otherwise please use '%1$s' below."
"You'll receive a Pincode in under a minute. Type this Pincode into the box below. If you don't receive one, please go to previous page and input your number again."

"Aviary is the world's leading photo editing platform. Developers: learn how to add it to your app in minutes."
"Sorry, there's no application on your device to handle this action. Do you want to download it now from the market?"
"Install Aviary's free pack of beautiful high resolution frames to get started."
Oops! I crashed, but a report has been sent to my developer to help him fix the issue!
Sorry, there was an error loading the plugin.
Sorry, there was an error loading some of the effect packs.
Sorry, you must update the Aviary editor to use this plugin.
This app needs to be updated to work with your installed effect packs. Tap \"update\" to update it in Google Play.

You need to update this app and some of the installed effect packs. Tap \"update\" to update them all in Google Play. This app may not not perform correctly unless everything is updated to the latest version
Sorry, you must update the plugin to continue.

One or more installed effect packs need to be updated. Tap \"update\" to update them all in Google Play. Alternatively, you can click any effect thumbnail marked with an update icon to update the pack it came from in Google Play.
There was an error downloading the image, please try again later.
Oops, there was an error trying to save the image to the Aviary folder. Do you want to try to save it to the default camera folder?
Oops, there was an error while saving the image.
Have a suggestion to improve this photo editor? Let us know.
A filter pack has been updated. Click ok to reload the packs list.
Image saved in %1$s. Do you want to see the saved image?
Aviary is a free embeddable photo editor that developers can add to their app in just minutes.
This beautiful new effects pack adds light leaks, cool colors, and visual distortions to your photos. Do you want to check it out?
The plugin seems corrupted, please try to install it again
Failed to copy the plugin, please try to reinstall it
Failed to copy the plugin inside the device storage

Here you can start your own board!
